text:
@WhiteHouse @realDonaldTrump Donald Trump is correct when he suggests that injecting yourself with disinfectant would kill off coronavirus.

Then again, so would setting yourself on fire, blowing yourself up with plastic explosive or freezing your body in a vat of liquid nitrogen.
